Description: Prosecution - Gov Facility Services Limited - Whilst the IP (GFSL Employee) was inspecting drain covers on a pedestrian walkway, he was struck by a forklift truck driven with a load obscuring their view. As a result of being hit by the forklift the IP sustained broken bones to his right leg.
Address: HMP Winchester / Gov FacilityH M PrisonRomsey RoadWINCHESTERHampshireSO22 5DFEngland
